mapper.update: update t_regulations set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publishdate = #{publishdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dept = #{dept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coment = #{coment,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, title, author, publishdate, dept, coment from t_regulations
